articles.content: Oil prices edged higher on Friday on optimism from the OPEC producer group that oil demand will be robust in 2024 as it also nudged up its expectations for global economic growth.Brent crude rose 7 c… [+1453 chars]

articles.title: In a pickle? The veggies behind the RBI rates | Mint - Mint
articles.description: In July inflation is expected to be higher than what was seen in June, primarily on account of a spike in vegetable prices, led by tomatoes
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has decided to maintain the status quo and keep the repo ratethe rate at which it lends to banksat 6.5%. This was largely because the RBI believes high inflation isnt … [+2930 chars]

articles.author: Divya Bhati
articles.title: UPI transaction limit increased: check new limit, how to pay using UPI Lite and more - India Today
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has proposed to increase the transaction limit of UPI Lite from Rs 200 to Rs 500 in offline mode, aiming to enhance convenience for users and promote digital payments.

articles.title: Cipla chairman says reports of company exiting business, stake sale speculative | Mint - Mint
articles.description: As of 30 June, 2023, the Cipla family held a 33.4% stake in Cipla Ltd., making them the largest shareholder in the company.
